Summary: 5 glowing orange balls. 3 in a triangular formation 2 seperate to the right side. Spotted NE of Michigan/ Ohio border.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Temperance
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding outside in the driveway, sky was clear. Watched objects move around changing directions and then slowly flickered out. Right after last object flickered out what appeared to be a shooting star was seen in the exact same area. We watched for a good 5 minutes between 3 people, we had a great view of the sky and was pretty amazing. 2 of us tried to get on our phone video recorders, but they are not really made for night recording so they were useless.
